title: TROLLING NUNU PLEASE BAN
body: hey any riot member,in a recent ranked game i was in the same team as a troll.he was following me around and stealing my camps,he would even flash or ult(he was playing nunu) to steal my camps and did the same when i tried to get lane farm.  Any riot member please contact me on here and ill send u the video of the griefer.thx

replies.body:
Put in a support ticket here;

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
